name: SurviveTheWinter2D
description: Survive The Winter 2D - Basic 2D platformer with its interesting idea. In this game, the main task is not to die from the cold, the gameplay can't be simple, it may seem initially, but with each level it's becoming more and more difficult, notes of Hardcore Platformer with parkour elements are added to the game, that is, you need to try to get to the precious fuel and Do not forget about the way back, in order to light a fire and restore the temperature indicator. Storyline - The main character (Rich), after a tornado, was taken far from the house, so as not to die from the cold, the main character decides to open a fire, and then move to the side of the house collecting sticks and kindling a fire in order to warm up and go again to the path where he will meet various obstacles.
